content: the pine tree is worked from the toe up starting with judy s magic cast on and used magic loop with circular needle an interesting feature is the stranded colorwork it is not for beginner but try to maintain good gauge you can make beautiful socks the pattern is given for one size foot length can be adjusted as desired use bigger needle for wide width the finished circumference is 21cm 8 2inch i hope you enjoy the pine tree socks **yarn** - camarose yaku merino wool - used 1000 as main color and 1980 as contrast color - 1 ball each **notions** - 3mm 80cm circular needle us size 2 5 - 3 stitch markers - if you are not familiar with stranded colorwork you can use bigger needle when you switch to colorwork **gauge** - 28sts 40rows - 10cm x 10cm 4inch - 3mm - stockinette stitch **languages** - korean - english width chart for colorwork **tutorial** https //youtu be/adcsocsx2p0 1 1 https //youtu be/adcsocsx2p0
